head.title: One Dead and One Hurt After Harlem Shooting

hedline.hl1: One Dead and One Hurt After Harlem Shooting

abstract.p: Ian Schillingford is killed and another man critically injured in shooting in Harlem apartment (S)

block.p: One man was killed and another critically injured last night in a shooting in an apartment in Harlem, the police said.
The victims were shot about 9:15 p.m. on the third floor of 1909 Amsterdam Avenue, near 155th Street, said Detective Edward Reuss, a police spokesman.
One man was killed and another critically injured last night in a shooting in an apartment in Harlem, the police said.
The victims were shot about 9:15 p.m. on the third floor of 1909 Amsterdam Avenue, near 155th Street, said Detective Edward Reuss, a police spokesman.

Ian Schillingford, 44, was shot once in the head and was pronounced dead at the scene, Detective Reuss said. The other man, a 51-year-old whose name was not released, was shot in the stomach, leg and arm and was in critical condition at Harlem Hospital, Detective Reuss said.
